Best for performance in large datasets

content.text: â€“ Creating unnecessary variables can affect memory. Use destructuring when needed.
â€“ Gathers values into an array.

const arr1 = [1, 2, 3];
const arr2 = [...arr1, 4, 5]; // Spread
console.log(arr2); // [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

const sum = (...numbers) => numbers.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0); // Rest
console.log(sum(1, 2, 3)); // 6
